info.title: Thahrav API
info.description: API for Thahrav - Crafted from Culture, Styled for Spirit. A culture-rooted fashion brand that reimagines Indian heritage through a contemporary lens.

post.description: Creates a new user account with the provided information
Authenticates a user with email and password
Sends a password reset link to the user's email
Resets the user's password using a token

400.description: Invalid input or passwords don't match

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Logs out the currently authenticated user

get.description: Returns a list of products with optional filtering and pagination
Returns a single product by its ID
Returns a list of all product categories
Returns the current user's shopping cart

delete.description: Removes all items from the user's cart

post.description: Adds a product to the user's cart

put.description: Updates the quantity of an item in the cart

delete.description: Removes an item from the cart

get.description: Returns a list of the user's orders with optional filtering and pagination

post.description: Creates a new order from the user's cart

paymentDetails.description: Required for card and UPI payments

get.description: Returns a single order by its ID
Returns tracking information for an order

400.description: Invalid input or passwords don't match

post.description: Adds a new address to the user's profile

delete.description: Deletes an address from the user's profile

post.description: Validates the cart items and shipping address before checkout

get.description: Returns available shipping methods based on the shipping address
Returns a list of journal articles with optional filtering and pagination
Returns a single journal article by its ID
Returns a list of all journal article categories

description.example: Inspired by Varanasi's rich textile heritage
Inspired by Varanasi's rich textile heritage, this handwoven silk kurta embodies the essence of traditional craftsmanship with a contemporary twist.

divineInspiration.example: This kurta draws inspiration from the sacred Ganges river and the ancient temples of Varanasi.

ritualUsage.example: Perfect for auspicious occasions, temple visits, and spiritual gatherings.

fabricOrigin.example: Handwoven by master weavers in Varanasi using techniques passed down through generations.

mantra.example: (Varanasi Kashi Vishwanath) - Honoring the eternal city of light

title.example: The Art of Block Printing: A Timeless Craft

excerpt.example: Exploring the ancient technique of hand block printing from Rajasthan and how it continues to influence modern textile design.

title.example: The Art of Block Printing: A Timeless Craft

content.example:
Block printing is believed to have originated in China around 4,000 years ago. From there, it spread to other parts of Asia, including India, where it found a particularly receptive home in Rajasthan.

The craft has been passed down through generations, with each region developing its own distinctive patterns and techniques.

bio.example: Priya is a textile historian and designer with a passion for traditional Indian crafts.
